name: You Are Mine 2
storyline:
An interactive game full of sensual stories!
The hero was now devoted to his work instead of love. She was on good terms with the handsome store manager and the deputy store manager, and went to a coffee shop after work or whenever something happened. Everyone respects the main character's idea of "I want to do my best for myself instead of love now," and the main character is happy because he feels a sense of fulfillment for the first time in his life. But at that time... who came to the main character! ?
summary:
Part 2 of the popular love story has finally arrived!

In this interactive romance otome game, you are the one in control of the romantic story!

You have several options as to how the story will unfold.
Immerse yourself in an enchanted game of your choice.
